name: load glyph
desc: The load_glyph module reads glyphs saved in any of the three primary EVS field file formats.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Offset Base
properties.desc: Offset Base is a toggle that changes the origin from the centroid of the glyph to the base.

properties.name: Alignment
properties.desc: The Alignment allows the user to choose how determine the orientation of the glyph.

properties.name: Roll
properties.desc: The Roll is a value that lets you control the rotation about the roll axis (glyph directional axis).

properties.name: Length Factor
properties.desc: Length Factor is a value that lets you scale the length of the glyph.

properties.name: Width Factor
properties.desc: Width Factor is a value that lets you scale the width of the glyph.

properties.name: Height Factor
properties.desc: Height Factor is a value that lets you scale the height of the glyph.
